column1: Thanks, Jimmy. Where are we going?
You know that girl Sally Rauman at our school? I can't stand her.
Really? Well, Kelligan bought the same purse and I was like, "No WAY do I want it now!" because who wants a purse that both their best friends have, right? And so-
I guess that's why I figured, "Who needs friends like THAT?"
It's like I told Debbie: "If you're gonna go out with my friends-"
"And so if you're gonna be that way, I don't need to be your friend."
You know, Jimmy, you are a great listener.
Yeah. I mean, no other boys really communicate like you do.
